h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand
content: Doing so will often cause the hand to become immobile for a few moments, so be ready to turn around and chase it to follow up some a few attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
Doing so will often cause the hand to become immobile for a few moments, so be ready to turn around and chase it to follow up some a few attacks.
